topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ed131863687270bb970e00#post_54ed131863687270bb970e00
[bq="AppleJackFrost"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ed12f6636872348a550400#post_54ed12f6636872348a550400
What's an Asura's Wrath?[/bq]
"Have you ever been so angry you punched God?":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qaECpq61H8g

For those of you that don't know what Asura's wrath is imagine Gurren Laggan combined with a smash em up fighting game and developed by CyberConnect2 complete with cutscenes, intermissions and commercials.  On the one hand the game aspect is lackluster, on the other hand the movie scenes are fucking amazing.

I would suggest watching it though cause it's better as a movie than a game; it's pretty much a movie anyhow.
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ed1348636872547d9a3a00#post_54ed1348636872547d9a3a00
[bq="Gizoid101"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ed12f6636872348a550400#post_54ed12f6636872348a550400
No.

!http://files.g4tv.com/rimg_606x0/ImageDb3/266976_l/Asuras-Wrath-Screenshots.jpg!

Big ass boss here![/bq]
For those of you that haven't seen Asura's wrath yet; that's the *FIRST* boss.  The final boss is God with a capital G.
